pattern.name: 000 Collection work, Archival, NOT 533
pattern.xpath: (substring(marc:leader, 8, 1) = 'c' and substring(marc:leader, 9, 1) = 'a') and not(exists(marc:datafield[@tag='533']))

pattern.name: 000 Collection work, NOT Archival, NOT 533
pattern.xpath: (substring(marc:leader, 8, 1) = 'c' and not(substring(marc:leader, 9, 1) = 'a')) and not(exists(marc:datafield[@tag='533']))

pattern.name: 000 SubUnit Collection work, NOT 533
pattern.xpath: (substring(marc:leader, 8, 1) = 'd' and not(exists(marc:datafield[@tag='533']))) and (substring(marc:leader, 7, 1) = 'p' or count(marc:datafield[@tag='300']) > 1 or count(marc:datafield[@tag='300']/marc:subfield[@code='a']) > 1)

pattern.name: 000 SubUnit Collection work, 300$a not 1, NOT 533
pattern.xpath: not(exists(marc:datafield[@tag='533'])) and not(marc:datafield[@tag='300']/marc:subfield[@code='a'][matches(., '^1 ')]) and (substring(marc:leader, 8, 1) = 'd')

pattern.name: 000 Serial OR integrating resource
pattern.xpath: (substring(marc:leader, 8, 1) = 's' or substring(marc:leader, 8, 1) = 'i')

pattern.name: 26X Open or closed dates of publ., etc.
26X Quest. or supplied open or closed dates of publ., etc.
pattern.xpath: exists( marc:datafield[(@tag='260' or @tag='264')][ marc:subfield[@code='c'][ contains(., '?-') or contains(., ']-') or contains(., '>-') or contains(., '-[') or contains(., '-<') or contains(., '-c') ] ] )

pattern.name: 26X Current/Intervening publishers
pattern.xpath: count(marc:datafield[starts-with(@tag, '26')]) >= 2 and (exists(marc:datafield[starts-with(@tag, '26')][@ind1='2']) or exists(marc:datafield[starts-with(@tag, '26')][@ind1='3']))

pattern.name: 300$a loose-leaf
pattern.xpath: marc:datafield[@tag='300']/marc:subfield[@code='a'][matches(lower-case(normalize-space(.)), 'loose-leaf')] or marc:datafield[@tag='300']/marc:subfield[@code='a'][matches(lower-case(normalize-space(.)), 'looseleaf')]

pattern.name: Frequency
pattern.xpath: exists(marc:datafield[@tag='310']) or exists(marc:datafield[@tag='321'])

pattern.name: 362 Dates/Sequential designation
pattern.xpath: exists(marc:datafield[@tag='362'])

pattern.name: 500 $a Kept up to date by
pattern.xpath: exists( marc:datafield[@tag='500']/marc:subfield[@code='a'] [contains(., 'Kept up to date by')] )

pattern.name: 000 Collection aggregate (not Collection work)
pattern.xpath: substring(marc:leader, 8, 1) = 'c' and exists(marc:datafield[@tag='533'])

pattern.name: 008/006 BK OR 245 Festschrift
pattern.xpath:
( marc:leader[ substring(., 7, 2) = 'aa' or substring(., 7, 2) = 'ac' or substring(., 7, 2) = 'ad' or substring(., 7, 2) = 'am' or substring(., 7, 1) = 't' ] and ( substring(marc:controlfield[@tag='008'], 31, 1) = '1' ) ) or ( exists( marc:datafield[@tag='245']/marc:subfield[ contains(lower-case(.), 'in honour of') or contains(lower-case(.), 'in honor of') or contains(lower-case(.), 'in memory of') or contains(lower-case(.), 'festschrift') ] ) ) or ( (substring(marc:leader, 7, 1) = 'a' or substring(marc:leader, 7, 1) = 't') and ( substring(marc:leader, 8, 1) = 'a' or substring(marc:leader, 8, 1) = 'c' or substring(marc:leader, 8, 1) = 'd' or substring(marc:leader, 8, 1) = 'm'
) and ( exists(marc:controlfield[@tag='006'][substring(., 14, 1) = '1']) ) )

pattern.name: 008-BK LitForm Conference
111 Proceedings, NOT report
pattern.xpath: ( exists( marc:datafield[@tag='111'] ) and (marc:datafield[@tag='245']) and not( marc:datafield[@tag='245'][contains(., 'report')] ) )

pattern.name: 110 Proceedings
pattern.xpath: exists( marc:datafield[@tag='110'][ not( marc:subfield[@code='a'][contains(., 'United States.')] and marc:subfield[@code='b'][contains(., 'Congress')] ) and (some $item in $List110b245aConferenceTerms satisfies marc:subfield[@code='b'][contains(., $item)]) and ( marc:subfield[ @code='n' or @code='c' or @code='d' ] ) ] ) and not( marc:datafield[@tag='245'][ contains(lower-case(.), 'report ') or contains(lower-case(.), 'hearing ') or contains(lower-case(.), 'an act') or contains(lower-case(.), 'a bill') or contains(lower-case(.), 'paper ') ] )

pattern.name: 300 Atlas
pattern.xpath: exists(marc:datafield[@tag='300']/marc:subfield[@code='a'][contains(lower-case(.), ' atlas')])

pattern.name: 6XX$a Atlases
pattern.xpath: exists(marc:datafield[starts-with(@tag, '6')]/marc:subfield[@code='a'][contains(lower-case(.), 'atlases')])

pattern.name: 6XX$v$x Atlases
pattern.xpath: marc:datafield[starts-with(@tag, '6')]/marc:subfield[@code='x'][matches(., '^Atlases\.?$')] or marc:datafield[starts-with(@tag, '6')]/marc:subfield[@code='v'][matches(., '^Atlases\.?$')]

pattern.name: 000/06 Scores AND Analytical
pattern.xpath: (substring(marc:leader, 7, 1) = 'c' or substring(marc:leader, 7, 1) = 'd') and exists(marc:datafield[starts-with(@tag, '7') and @ind2='2'])

pattern.name: 505 sor NOWHERE 7XX I2=2
pattern.xpath: ( exists(marc:datafield[@tag='505']/marc:subfield[@code='r']) or exists(marc:datafield[@tag='505']/marc:subfield[@code='a'][contains(., ' / ')]) ) and not( exists( marc:datafield[starts-with(@tag, '7') and substring(@ind2, 1, 1) = '2']/marc:subfield[@code='t'] ) ) and not( substring(marc:leader, 7, 1) = 'c' or substring(marc:leader, 7, 1) = 'd' or substring(marc:leader, 7, 1) = 'j' )

pattern.name: 000/06 Scores AND 505
pattern.xpath: (substring(marc:leader, 7, 1) = 'c' or substring(marc:leader, 7, 1) = 'd') and exists(marc:datafield[@tag='505'])

pattern.name: 000/06 Music AND 505
pattern.xpath: (substring(marc:leader, 7, 1) = 'j') and exists(marc:datafield[@tag='505'])

pattern.name: 7XX I2=2 Not Music AND 505 SOR
pattern.xpath: ( not(substring(marc:leader, 7, 1) = 'c' or substring(marc:leader, 7, 1) = 'd' or substring(marc:leader, 7, 1) = 'j' ) and ( exists(marc:datafield[@tag='505']/marc:subfield[@code='r']) or exists(marc:datafield[@tag='505']/marc:subfield[@code='a'][contains(., ' / ')]) ) ) and ( exists(marc:datafield[starts-with(@tag, '7') and @ind2='2']/marc:subfield[@code='t'][not(../marc:subfield[@code='5'])]) or exists(marc:datafield[@tag='740' and @ind2='2']/marc:subfield[@code='a'][not(../marc:subfield[@code='5'])]) )

pattern.name: 7XX I2=2 NOWHERE 505 SOR
pattern.xpath: ( marc:datafield[(@tag='700' or @tag='710' or @tag='711')][@ind2='2'][marc:subfield[@code='t']][not(marc:subfield[@code='5'])] or marc:datafield[(@tag='730' or @tag='740')][@ind2='2'][marc:subfield[@code='a']][not(marc:subfield[@code='5'])] ) and not(marc:datafield[@tag='505']/marc:subfield[@code='r']) and not(marc:datafield[@tag='505']/marc:subfield[@code='a'][contains(., ' / ')]) and not( contains(substring(marc:leader, 7, 1), 'c') or contains(substring(marc:leader, 7, 1), 'd') or contains(substring(marc:leader, 7, 1), 'j') ) and not(marc:datafield[@tag = '041'][count(marc:subfield[@code='a']) gt 1]) and not(marc:datafield[@tag = '041'][matches(marc:subfield[@code = 'a'], '[a-z]{4}')])

pattern.name: 000/06 Music AND Analytical
pattern.xpath: (substring(marc:leader, 7, 1) = 'j') and exists(marc:datafield[starts-with(@tag, '7') and @ind2='2'])

pattern.name: 000/06 Music AND mult. SOR
pattern.xpath: ( substring(marc:leader, 7, 1) = 'c' or substring(marc:leader, 7, 1) = 'd' or substring(marc:leader, 7, 1) = 'j' ) and exists( marc:datafield[@tag='245']/marc:subfield[@code='c'] [contains(., ' / ')] ) and not(exists( marc:datafield[@tag='245']/marc:subfield[@code='c'] [contains(., ' = ')] ) )

pattern.name: 000/06 Music AND 245$b subsequent titles
pattern.xpath: ( substring(marc:leader, 7, 1) = 'c' or substring(marc:leader, 7, 1) = 'd' or substring(marc:leader, 7, 1) = 'j' ) and exists( marc:datafield[@tag='245']/marc:subfield[@code='b'] [contains(., ' ; ')] )

pattern.name: 000/06 Music AND 245$a subsequent titles
pattern.xpath: ( substring(marc:leader, 7, 1) = 'c' or substring(marc:leader, 7, 1) = 'd' or substring(marc:leader, 7, 1) = 'j' ) and exists( marc:datafield[@tag='245']/marc:subfield[@code='a'][ contains(., ' ; ') or contains(., ' ;') ] ) and not( marc:datafield[@tag='245']/marc:subfield[@code='b'][ matches(., '^or,') ] )

pattern.name: 000/06 Not Music AND mult. SOR
pattern.xpath: not( substring(marc:leader, 7, 1) = 'c' or substring(marc:leader, 7, 1) = 'd' or substring(marc:leader, 7, 1) = 'j' ) and exists( marc:datafield[@tag='245']/marc:subfield[@code='c'][ contains(., ' / ') ] ) and not( marc:datafield[@tag='245']/marc:subfield[@code='c'][ contains(., ' = ') ] )

pattern.name: 000/06 Not Music AND 245$b subsequent titles
pattern.xpath: not( substring(marc:leader, 7, 1) = 'c' or substring(marc:leader, 7, 1) = 'd' or substring(marc:leader, 7, 1) = 'j' ) and exists( marc:datafield[@tag='245']/marc:subfield[@code='b'][ contains(., ' ; ') ] )

pattern.name: 000/06 Not Music AND 245$a subsequent titles
pattern.xpath: not( substring(marc:leader, 7, 1) = 'c' or substring(marc:leader, 7, 1) = 'd' or substring(marc:leader, 7, 1) = 'j' ) and ( ( marc:datafield[@tag='245']/marc:subfield[@code='a'][ matches(., ' ; [A-Z]') ] ) or ( marc:datafield[@tag='245']/marc:subfield[@code='b'][preceding-sibling::*[1][ends-with(., ' ;')]][matches(., '^[A-Z]')] ) )

pattern.name: 245$a Collection terms
pattern.xpath: some $item in $List245aCollectionTerms satisfies marc:datafield[@tag='245']/marc:subfield[@code='a'][contains(lower-case(.), lower-case($item))]

pattern.name: 245$b Collection terms
245$c Collection terms
pattern.xpath: some $item in $List245cCollectionTerms satisfies marc:datafield[@tag='245']/marc:subfield[@code='c'][matches(lower-case(.), lower-case($item))]

pattern.name: 520$a Collection terms
pattern.xpath: some $item in $List520aCollectionTerms satisfies marc:datafield[@tag='520']/marc:subfield[@code='a'][contains(lower-case(.), lower-case($item))]

pattern.name: 1XX$e Aggregator terms
1XX$4 Aggregator terms
pattern.xpath: some $item in $ListVAgent4Aggregators satisfies marc:datafield[starts-with(@tag, '1')]/marc:subfield[@code='4'] = lower-case($item)

pattern.name: 7XX$e Aggregator terms
pattern.xpath: some $item in $ListVAgentEAggregators satisfies marc:datafield[starts-with(@tag, '7')]/marc:subfield[@code='e'][contains(lower-case(.), lower-case($item))]

pattern.name: 7XX$4 Aggregator terms
pattern.xpath: some $item in $ListVAgent4Aggregators satisfies marc:datafield[starts-with(@tag, '7')]/marc:subfield[@code='4'][contains(lower-case(.), lower-case($item))]

pattern.name: 240 CCT Texts, etc.
240 NOT CCT Texts, etc. AND Selections
pattern.xpath: not( substring(marc:leader, 7, 1) = 'c' or substring(marc:leader, 7, 1) = 'd' or substring(marc:leader, 7, 1) = 'j' ) and exists( marc:datafield[@tag='240'][ marc:subfield[@code='k'][contains(., 'Selections')] and not(some $item in $ListVTextsCCT satisfies contains(marc:subfield[@code='a'], $item)) ] ) and ( exists( marc:datafield[@tag='505'] ) or exists(marc:datafield[@tag='700'][@ind2='2']) )

pattern.name: 240 CCT MLA Type AND Selections AND 505 OR Analytical
pattern.xpath: (some $item in $ListVMusicCCT_MLA_Type_Plural satisfies marc:datafield[@tag='240']/marc:subfield[@code='a'][matches(., $item)]) and not( marc:datafield[@tag='240'][ marc:subfield[@code='n' or @code='p'] ] ) and ( marc:datafield[@tag='240']/marc:subfield[@code='k'][(contains(., 'Selections'))] ) and ( exists(marc:datafield[@tag='505']) or exists(marc:datafield[starts-with(@tag, '7')][@ind2='2']) )

pattern.name: 240 CCT MLA Medium AND Selections AND 505 OR Analytical
pattern.xpath: (some $item in $ListVMusicCCT_MLA_Medium satisfies marc:datafield[@tag='240']/marc:subfield[@code='a'][matches(., $item)]) and not( marc:datafield[@tag='240'][ marc:sufield[@code='n' or @code='p'] ] ) and ( marc:datafield[@tag='240']/marc:subfield[@code='k'][(contains(., 'Selections'))] ) and ( exists(marc:datafield[@tag='505']) or exists(marc:datafield[starts-with(@tag, '7')][@ind2='2']) )

pattern.name: 245$c arranged NOT Music
pattern.xpath: not( substring(marc:leader, 7, 1) = 'c' or substring(marc:leader, 7, 1) = 'd' or substring(marc:leader, 7, 1) = 'j' ) and exists( marc:datafield[@tag='245']/marc:subfield[@code='c'][ contains(., 'arranged') and not(contains(., 'song')) and not(contains(., 'music')) ] )

pattern.name: 245$c Aggregator terms
pattern.xpath: some $item in $List245cAggregators satisfies marc:datafield[@tag='245']/marc:subfield[@code='c'][contains(., $item)] and not( marc:datafield[@tag='300']/marc:subfield[@code='a'][contains(., '1 map')] )

pattern.name: 245$a Readers, edited
pattern.xpath: ( marc:datafield[@tag='245']/marc:subfield[@code='a'][matches(., 'A.* reader ')] or marc:datafield[@tag='245']/marc:subfield[@code='a'][matches(., 'The.* reader ')] ) and ( exists(marc:datafield[@tag='245']/marc:subfield[@code='c'][starts-with(lower-case(.), 'edited')]) or exists(marc:datafield[@tag='245']/marc:subfield[@code='c'][starts-with(lower-case(.), 'compiled')]) )

pattern.name: 245$c edit OR general editor AND 130
pattern.xpath: ( exists(marc:datafield[@tag='245']/marc:subfield[@code='c'][contains(lower-case(.), 'general editor')]) or exists(marc:datafield[@tag='245']/marc:subfield[@code='c'][matches(lower-case(.), '^edit')]) ) and exists(marc:datafield[@tag='130'])

pattern.name: 245$c edited OR editor NOT 100,110,111
pattern.xpath: ( exists(marc:datafield[@tag='245']/marc:subfield[@code='c'][matches(lower-case(.), '^edited')]) or exists(marc:datafield[@tag='245']/marc:subfield[@code='c'][matches(lower-case(.), '^editor')]) ) and not(exists(marc:datafield[@tag='100'])) and not(exists(marc:datafield[@tag='110'])) and not(exists(marc:datafield[@tag='111']))

pattern.name: 245$c edited||editors NOT 100
pattern.xpath: ( exists(marc:datafield[@tag='245']/marc:subfield[@code='c'][contains(lower-case(.), 'edited by')]) or exists(marc:datafield[@tag='245']/marc:subfield[@code='c'][contains(lower-case(.), 'editors')]) ) and not(exists(marc:datafield[@tag='100']))

pattern.name: 7XX$i aggregates
pattern.xpath: exists(marc:datafield[starts-with(@tag, '7')]/marc:subfield[@code='i'][contains(., 'aggregates')])

pattern.name: 655$a Collection terms
pattern.xpath: exists( marc:datafield[@tag='655'][ not(marc:subfield[@code='x' or @code='v']) and (some $item in $ListV650a_655aCollectionTerms satisfies contains(marc:subfield[@code='a'], $item)) ] )

pattern.name: 655$a Collection terms (Usually)
pattern.xpath: exists( marc:datafield[@tag='655'][ not(marc:subfield[@code='x' or @code='v']) and (some $item in $ListV650a_655aCollectionTermsUsually satisfies matches(marc:subfield[@code='a'], $item)) ] )

pattern.name: 650$a Collection terms
650$a Collection terms (Usually)
650$v Collection terms (Usually)
650$v Collection terms
008-BK Content Collection
pattern.xpath: ( marc:leader[ substring(., 7, 2) = 'aa' or substring(., 7, 2) = 'am' or substring(., 7, 2) = 'ta' or substring(., 7, 2) = 'tm' ] and exists(marc:controlfield[@tag='008'][matches(substring(., 25, 4), '[cdelnorvwy5]')]) ) or ( marc:leader[ substring(., 7, 2) = 'aa' or substring(., 7, 2) = 'am' or substring(., 7, 2) = 'ta' or substring(., 7, 2) = 'tm' ] and exists(marc:controlfield[@tag='006'][matches(substring(., 8, 4), '[cdelnorvwy5]')]) )

pattern.name: 008-BK LitForm Collection
pattern.xpath: ( marc:leader[ substring(., 7, 2) = 'aa' or substring(., 7, 2) = 'ac' or substring(., 7, 2) = 'ad' or substring(., 7, 2) = 'am' or substring(., 7, 1) = 't' ] and exists(marc:controlfield[@tag='008'][matches(substring(., 34, 1), '[eijmp]')]) ) or ( marc:leader[ substring(., 7, 2) = 'aa' or substring(., 7, 2) = 'ac' or substring(., 7, 2) = 'ad' or substring(., 7, 2) = 'am' or substring(., 7, 1) = 't' ] and exists(marc:controlfield[@tag='006'][matches(substring(., 17, 1), '[eijmp]')]) )

pattern.name: 008-CF Type-Collection
pattern.xpath: ( marc:leader[ substring(., 7, 2) = 'ma' or substring(., 7, 2) = 'mb' or substring(., 7, 2) = 'mc' or substring(., 7, 2) = 'md' or substring(., 7, 2) = 'mi' or substring(., 7, 2) = 'mm' or substring(., 7, 2) = 'ms' ] and exists(marc:controlfield[@tag='008'][matches(substring(., 27, 1), '[acejm]')]) )

pattern.name: 500$a Collection terms
pattern.xpath: exists( marc:datafield[@tag='500'][ not( marc:subfield[@code='a'][ contains(lower-case(.), 'based on') or contains(lower-case(.), 'classic stories') or contains(lower-case(.), "children's stories") or contains(lower-case(.), 'graphic') or contains(lower-case(.), 'readers') or contains(lower-case(.), 'comic') ] ) and ( marc:subfield[@code='a'][ contains(lower-case(.), 'short stories') or contains(lower-case(.), 'poems') or contains(lower-case(.), 'lectures') or contains(lower-case(.), 'collection of') or contains(lower-case(.), 'essays') or contains(lower-case(.), 'contains also') or contains(lower-case(.), 'contains works') or matches(lower-case(.), '^with: ') ] ) ] )

pattern.name: 245$c Contributions AND ed
pattern.xpath: not(exists(marc:datafield[@tag='100'])) and exists( marc:datafield[@tag='245']/marc:subfield[@code='c'][ contains(., 'with contributions by') and contains(., 'ed') ] )

pattern.name: 655$a Cookbook
pattern.xpath: exists(marc:datafield[@tag='655']/marc:subfield[@code='a'][contains(lower-case(.), 'cookbook')])

pattern.name: 650$a Cooking ...
245$a$b Cookbook
000 MP 300 mult. maps
pattern.xpath: ( substring(marc:leader, 7, 1) = 'e' or substring(marc:leader, 7, 1) = 'f' ) and ( exists( marc:datafield[@tag='300']/marc:subfield[@code='a'][ contains(lower-case(.), 'pages') or contains(lower-case(.), 'p.') or contains(lower-case(.), 'leaves') or contains(lower-case(.), 'volume') or contains(lower-case(.), 'vol.') or contains(lower-case(.), 'v.') or contains(lower-case(.), 'maps') ] ) or exists( marc:datafield[@tag='300']/marc:subfield[@code='b'][ contains(lower-case(.), 'chiefly maps') ] ) )

pattern.name: 000 VM 300 mult. graphics
501 With
pattern.xpath: exists( marc:datafield[@tag='501'][ not(marc:subfield[@code='5']) and marc:subfield[@code='a'][ not(contains(lower-case(.), 'bound')) and contains(lower-case(.), 'with') ] ] )

pattern.name: 008-VM Type, 300$a not 1
pattern.xpath: ( not( substring(marc:leader, 8, 1) = 'c' or substring(marc:leader, 8, 1) = 'd' ) ) and ( substring(marc:leader, 7, 1) = 'g' or substring(marc:leader, 7, 1) = 'k' or substring(marc:leader, 7, 1) = 'o' or substring(marc:leader, 7, 1) = 'r' ) and ( marc:controlfield[@tag='008'][matches(substring(., 34, 1), '^[acdghiklnpqrstw]$')] or marc:controlfield[@tag='006'][matches(substring(., 17, 1), '^[acdghiklnpqrstw]$')] ) and ( not( exists( marc:datafield[@tag='300']/marc:subfield[@code='a'][ matches(string(.), '^1 ') ] ) ) )

pattern.name: 000/06 Kit
pattern.xpath: (substring(marc:leader, 7, 1) = 'o' or ( marc:datafield[@tag='245']/marc:subfield[@code='h'][matches(., '\[kit\]')]) )

pattern.name: 300$a Music parts
pattern.xpath: ( substring(marc:leader, 7, 1) = 'c' or substring(marc:leader, 7, 1) = 'd' ) and exists(marc:datafield[@tag='300']/marc:subfield[@code='a'][contains(lower-case(.), 'part')])

pattern.name: 300$e Music parts
pattern.xpath: ( substring(marc:leader, 7, 1) = 'c' or substring(marc:leader, 7, 1) = 'd' ) and exists(marc:datafield[@tag='300']/marc:subfield[@code='e'][contains(lower-case(.), 'part')])

pattern.name: 6XX$x$v Music parts
6XX$a Parts music
pattern.xpath: ( substring(marc:leader, 7, 1) = 'c' or substring(marc:leader, 7, 1) = 'd' ) and (exists(marc:datafield[starts-with(@tag, '6')]/marc:subfield[@code='a'][contains(., 'Parts')]))

pattern.name: 6XX$a Parts music
pattern.xpath: ( exists( marc:datafield[@tag='130']/marc:subfield[@code='l'][ contains(lower-case(.), ' and ') or contains(lower-case(.), '&') or contains(lower-case(.), 'polyglot') ] ) ) or ( exists( marc:datafield[@tag='240']/marc:subfield[@code='l'][ contains(lower-case(.), ' and ') or contains(lower-case(.), '&') or contains(lower-case(.), 'polyglot') ] ) )

pattern.name: 250$a Mult. language terms
pattern.xpath: exists( marc:datafield[@tag='250']/marc:subfield[@code='a'][ contains(lower-case(.), 'parallel') or contains(lower-case(.), 'bilingual') or contains(lower-case(.), 'dual-language') or contains(lower-case(.), 'multilingual') or contains(lower-case(.), 'multi-lingual') or contains(lower-case(.), 'polyglot') ] )

pattern.name: 546$a'In' Mult. Lang. AND 041$a$d Mult. Lang
pattern.xpath: ( ( marc:datafield[@tag = '041'][count(marc:subfield[@code = 'a']) gt 1] or marc:datafield[@tag = '041'][count(marc:subfield[@code = 'd']) gt 1] ) or ( marc:datafield[@tag = '041'][matches(marc:subfield[@code = 'a'], '[a-z]{4}')] or marc:datafield[@tag = '041'][matches(marc:subfield[@code = 'd'], '[a-z]{4}')] ) ) and ( exists( marc:datafield[@tag='546']/marc:subfield[@code='a'][ matches(., '^In [A-Z][a-z]+ and [A-Z][a-z]+') or matches(., '^In [A-Z][a-z]+, [A-Z][a-z]+') ] ) )

pattern.name: 546$aMult. Lang. 'and/or/list' AND 041$a$d Mult. lang
pattern.xpath: ( ( marc:datafield[@tag = '041'][count(marc:subfield[@code = 'a']) gt 1] or marc:datafield[@tag = '041'][count(marc:subfield[@code = 'd']) gt 1] ) or ( marc:datafield[@tag = '041'][matches(marc:subfield[@code = 'a'], '[a-z]{4}')] or marc:datafield[@tag = '041'][matches(marc:subfield[@code = 'd'], '[a-z]{4}')] ) ) and ( exists( marc:datafield[@tag='546']/marc:subfield[@code='a'][ matches(., '^[A-Z][a-z]+ and [A-Z][a-z]+') or matches(., '^[A-Z][a-z]+ or [A-Z][a-z]+') or matches(., '^[A-Z][a-z]+, [A-Z][a-z]+') ] ) )

pattern.name: 546$aLang with transl. and 041$a$d Mult. lang
pattern.xpath: exists( marc:datafield[@tag='546'][ not(some $item in $List546aNotParallelTerms satisfies contains(marc:subfield[@code='a'], $item)) and ( matches(marc:subfield[@code='a'], '[A-Z][a-z]+ and translation in [A-Z][a-z]+') or matches(marc:subfield[@code='a'], '[A-Z][a-z]+ and [A-Z][a-z]+ translation') or matches(marc:subfield[@code='a'], '[A-Z][a-z]+ text with [A-Z][a-z]+ translation') or matches(marc:subfield[@code='a'], '[A-Z][a-z]+ texts with [A-Z][a-z]+ translation') ) ] ) and ( ( marc:datafield[@tag = '041'][count(marc:subfield[@code = 'a']) gt 1] or marc:datafield[@tag = '041'][count(marc:subfield[@code = 'd']) gt 1] ) or ( marc:datafield[@tag = '041'][matches(marc:subfield[@code = 'a'], '[a-z]{4}')] or marc:datafield[@tag = '041'][matches(marc:subfield[@code = 'd'], '[a-z]{4}')] ) )

pattern.name: 546$a'Text in' etc. NOT 'only' etc. AND 041$a$d Mult. lang
pattern.xpath: exists( marc:datafield[@tag='546'][ not( matches(marc:subfield[@code='a'], '^The [a-z][a-z]+ work') or matches(marc:subfield[@code='a'], '^In [A-Z][a-z]+ only') or matches(marc:subfield[@code='a'], '^In [A-Z][a-z]+ with') or matches(marc:subfield[@code='a'], '^In [A-Z][a-z]+, with') or matches(marc:subfield[@code='a'], '^In [A-Z][a-z]+;') or matches(marc:subfield[@code='a'], 'in [A-Z][a-z]+ only') or matches(marc:subfield[@code='a'], 'in [A-Z][a-z]+, with') or matches(marc:subfield[@code='a'], 'in [A-Z][a-z]+;') or matches(marc:subfield[@code='a'], 'in [A-Z][a-z]+ with') ) and ( matches(marc:subfield[@code='a'], '^Text in') or matches(marc:subfield[@code='a'], '^Texts in') or matches(marc:subfield[@code='a'], '^Songs in') or matches(marc:subfield[@code='a'], '^Sung in') ) ] ) and ( ( marc:datafield[@tag = '041'][count(marc:subfield[@code = 'a']) gt 1] or marc:datafield[@tag = '041'][count(marc:subfield[@code = 'd']) gt 1] ) or ( marc:datafield[@tag = '041'][matches(marc:subfield[@code = 'a'], '[a-z]{4}')] or marc:datafield[@tag = '041'][matches(marc:subfield[@code = 'd'], '[a-z]{4}')] ) )

pattern.name: 546List-PPT 041$a$d Mult. lang.
pattern.xpath: ( ( marc:datafield[@tag = '041'][count(marc:subfield[@code = 'a']) gt 1] or marc:datafield[@tag = '041'][count(marc:subfield[@code = 'd']) gt 1] ) or ( marc:datafield[@tag = '041'][matches(marc:subfield[@code = 'a'], '[a-z]{4}')] or marc:datafield[@tag = '041'][matches(marc:subfield[@code = 'd'], '[a-z]{4}')] ) ) and (some $item in $List500_520_546aParallelPlusTerms_CaseNo satisfies marc:datafield[@tag='546']/marc:subfield[@code='a'][contains(lower-case(.), $item)])

pattern.name: 500List-POT 041$a$d Mult. lang.
pattern.xpath: ( ( marc:datafield[@tag = '041'][count(marc:subfield[@code = 'a']) gt 1] or marc:datafield[@tag = '041'][count(marc:subfield[@code = 'd']) gt 1] ) or ( marc:datafield[@tag = '041'][matches(marc:subfield[@code = 'a'], '[a-z]{4}')] or marc:datafield[@tag = '041'][matches(marc:subfield[@code = 'd'], '[a-z]{4}')] ) ) and ( some $item in $List500_520ParallelOnlyTerms_CaseNo satisfies marc:datafield[@tag='500']/marc:subfield[@code='a'][contains(lower-case(.), lower-case($item))] )

pattern.name: 520List-POT 041$a$d Mult. lang.
pattern.xpath: ( ( marc:datafield[@tag = '041'][count(marc:subfield[@code = 'a']) gt 1] or marc:datafield[@tag = '041'][count(marc:subfield[@code = 'd']) gt 1] ) or ( marc:datafield[@tag = '041'][matches(marc:subfield[@code = 'a'], '[a-z]{4}')] or marc:datafield[@tag = '041'][matches(marc:subfield[@code = 'd'], '[a-z]{4}')] ) ) and ( some $item in $List500_520ParallelOnlyTerms_CaseNo satisfies marc:datafield[@tag='520']/marc:subfield[@code='a'][contains(., $item)] )

pattern.name: 245$a' = ' 041$a$d Mult. lang.
pattern.xpath: ( ( marc:datafield[@tag = '041'][count(marc:subfield[@code = 'a']) gt 1] or marc:datafield[@tag = '041'][count(marc:subfield[@code = 'd']) gt 1] ) or ( marc:datafield[@tag = '041'][matches(marc:subfield[@code = 'a'], '[a-z]{4}')] or marc:datafield[@tag = '041'][matches(marc:subfield[@code = 'd'], '[a-z]{4}')] ) ) and ( marc:datafield[@tag='245']/marc:subfield[@code='a'][contains(., ' = ')] ) and not ( some $item in $List500_520ParallelOnlyTerms_CaseNo satisfies marc:datafield[@tag='546'][contains(lower-case(.), $item)] )

pattern.name: 245 ' =$b' 041$a$d Mult. lang.
pattern.xpath:
( ( marc:datafield[@tag = '041'][count(marc:subfield[@code = 'a']) gt 1] or marc:datafield[@tag = '041'][count(marc:subfield[@code = 'd']) gt 1] ) or ( marc:datafield[@tag = '041'][matches(marc:subfield[@code = 'a'], '[a-z]{4}')] or marc:datafield[@tag = '041'][matches(marc:subfield[@code = 'd'], '[a-z]{4}')] ) ) and ( exists( marc:datafield[@tag='245']/marc:subfield[@code='b'][preceding-sibling::*[1][ends-with(., '=')]]
) or exists( marc:datafield[@tag='245']/marc:subfield[@code='b'][contains(., ' = ')] ) ) and ( not( some $item in $List546aNotParallelTerms satisfies marc:datafield[@tag='546']/marc:subfield[@code='a'][contains(lower-case(.), lower-case($item))] ) )

pattern.name: 245$c'/ ' 041$a$d Mult. lang.
pattern.xpath: ( ( marc:datafield[@tag = '041'][count(marc:subfield[@code = 'a']) gt 1] or marc:datafield[@tag = '041'][count(marc:subfield[@code = 'd']) gt 1] ) or ( marc:datafield[@tag = '041'][matches(marc:subfield[@code = 'a'], '[a-z]{4}')] or marc:datafield[@tag = '041'][matches(marc:subfield[@code = 'd'], '[a-z]{4}')] ) ) and ( exists( marc:datafield[@tag='245']/marc:subfield[@code='c'][ contains(., ' / ') and contains(., ' = ') ] ) )

pattern.name: 65X$x$v Mult. language terms
pattern.xpath: ( ( marc:datafield[@tag = '041'][count(marc:subfield[@code = 'a']) gt 1] or marc:datafield[@tag = '041'][count(marc:subfield[@code = 'd']) gt 1] ) or ( marc:datafield[@tag = '041'][matches(marc:subfield[@code = 'a'], '[a-z]{4}')] or marc:datafield[@tag = '041'][matches(marc:subfield[@code = 'd'], '[a-z]{4}')] ) ) and ( exists( marc:datafield[starts-with(@tag, '65')]/marc:subfield[@code='v'][ contains(., 'Bilingual') or contains(., 'Polyglot') ] ) or exists( marc:datafield[starts-with(@tag, '65')]/marc:subfield[@code='x'][ contains(., 'Bilingual') or contains(., 'Polyglot') ] ) )

pattern.name: 5XX$a inverted, etc. NOT parallel
pattern.xpath: not(marc:datafield[@tag = '041']/marc:subfield[@code='a'][matches(., '[a-z]{4}')]) and not( count(marc:datafield[@tag='041']/marc:subfield[@code='a']) = 2 ) and exists( marc:datafield[@tag='500'][ not(matches(marc:subfield[@code='a'], '[A-Z][a-z]+ and [A-Z][a-z]')) and (some $item in $ListInvertedEtcTerms satisfies contains(lower-case(marc:subfield[@code='a']), lower-case($item))) ] ) and (substring(marc:leader, 7, 1) = 'a')

pattern.name: 300$e Accompanying
pattern.xpath: exists(marc:datafield[@tag='300']/marc:subfield[@code='e'])

pattern.name: 33X More than one
pattern.xpath: (count(marc:datafield[@tag = '336']) gt 1) or (count(marc:datafield[@tag = '337']) gt 1) or (count(marc:datafield[@tag = '338']) gt 1)

pattern.name: 8XX or 440 present
pattern.xpath: (exists(marc:datafield[@tag='800']) or exists(marc:datafield[starts-with(@tag, '81')]) or exists(marc:datafield[@tag='830']) or exists(marc:datafield[@tag='440']) )

pattern.name: 504 present AAM
pattern.xpath: exists(marc:datafield[@tag='504']) and (exists(marc:datafield[@tag='700']/ marc:subfield[@code='e' or @code='4' or @code='0' or @code='1' or @code='t']) or exists(marc:datafield[@tag='710']/ marc:subfield[@code='e' or @code='4' or @code='0' or @code='1' or @code='t']) or exists(marc:datafield[@tag='711']/ marc:subfield[@code='e' or @code='4' or @code='0' or @code='1' or @code='t']) or exists(marc:datafield[@tag='730']))

pattern.name: 504 present
pattern.xpath: exists(marc:datafield[@tag='504'])

pattern.name: 008 BK Index AAM
pattern.xpath: (( substring(marc:leader, 7, 1) = 'a' or substring(marc:leader, 7, 1) = 't' ) and ( not( substring(marc:leader, 8, 1) = 'b' or substring(marc:leader, 8, 1) = 'i' or substring(marc:leader, 8, 1) = 's' ) ) and ( substring(marc:controlfield[@tag='008'], 32, 1) = '1' )) and (exists(marc:datafield[@tag='700']/ marc:subfield[@code='e' or @code='4' or @code='0' or @code='1' or @code='t']) or exists(marc:datafield[@tag='710']/ marc:subfield[@code='e' or @code='4' or @code='0' or @code='1' or @code='t']) or exists(marc:datafield[@tag='711']/ marc:subfield[@code='e' or @code='4' or @code='0' or @code='1' or @code='t']) or exists(marc:datafield[@tag='730']))

pattern.name: 008 BK Index
pattern.xpath: ( substring(marc:leader, 7, 1) = 'a' or substring(marc:leader, 7, 1) = 't' ) and ( not( substring(marc:leader, 8, 1) = 'b' or substring(marc:leader, 8, 1) = 'i' or substring(marc:leader, 8, 1) = 's' ) ) and ( substring(marc:controlfield[@tag='008'], 32, 1) = '1' )

pattern.name: 500 Index, bibliog, etc. AAM
pattern.xpath: (exists( marc:datafield[@tag='500'][ not(marc:subfield[@code='5']) and not(marc:subfield[@code='a'][contains(lower-case(.), 'cataloged from')]) and marc:subfield[@code='a'][ contains(lower-case(.), 'index') or contains(lower-case(.), 'bibliog') or contains(lower-case(.), 'filmog') or contains(lower-case(.), 'discographies') or contains(lower-case(.), 'discography') or contains(lower-case(.), 'notes') or contains(lower-case(.), 'annotations') or contains(lower-case(.), 'commentar') or contains(lower-case(.), 'bonus') ] ] )) and (exists(marc:datafield[@tag='700']/ marc:subfield[@code='e' or @code='4' or @code='0' or @code='1' or @code='t']) or exists(marc:datafield[@tag='710']/ marc:subfield[@code='e' or @code='4' or @code='0' or @code='1' or @code='t']) or exists(marc:datafield[@tag='711']/ marc:subfield[@code='e' or @code='4' or @code='0' or @code='1' or @code='t']) or exists(marc:datafield[@tag='730']))

pattern.name: 500 Index, bibliog, etc.
pattern.xpath: exists( marc:datafield[@tag='500'][ not(marc:subfield[@code='5']) and not(marc:subfield[@code='a'][contains(lower-case(.), 'cataloged from')]) and marc:subfield[@code='a'][ contains(lower-case(.), 'index') or contains(lower-case(.), 'bibliog') or contains(lower-case(.), 'filmog') or contains(lower-case(.), 'discographies') or contains(lower-case(.), 'discography') or contains(lower-case(.), 'notes') or contains(lower-case(.), 'annotations') or contains(lower-case(.), 'commentar') or contains(lower-case(.), 'bonus') ] ] )

pattern.name: 500$a Includes AAM
pattern.xpath: exists( marc:datafield[@tag='500'][ not(marc:subfield[@code='5']) and marc:subfield[@code='a'][contains(lower-case(.), 'includes')] and marc:subfield[@code='a'][ contains(lower-case(.), 'program note') or contains(lower-case(.), 'preface') or contains(lower-case(.), 'commentar') or contains(lower-case(.), 'manual') or contains(lower-case(.), 'codebook') or contains(lower-case(.), 'user instructions') or contains(lower-case(.), 'printed script') or contains(lower-case(.), 'sound') or contains(lower-case(.), 'thematic index') or contains(lower-case(.), 'libretto') or contains(lower-case(.), 'biography') or contains(lower-case(.), 'technical information') or contains(lower-case(.), 'historical information') or contains(lower-case(.), 'ethnological information') or contains(lower-case(.), 'instructional material') or contains(lower-case(.), 'music') ] ] ) and (exists(marc:datafield[@tag='700']/ marc:subfield[@code='e' or @code='4' or @code='0' or @code='1' or @code='t']) or exists(marc:datafield[@tag='710']/ marc:subfield[@code='e' or @code='4' or @code='0' or @code='1' or @code='t']) or exists(marc:datafield[@tag='711']/ marc:subfield[@code='e' or @code='4' or @code='0' or @code='1' or @code='t']) or exists(marc:datafield[@tag='730']))

pattern.name: 500$a Includes
pattern.xpath: exists( marc:datafield[@tag='500'][ not(marc:subfield[@code='5']) and marc:subfield[@code='a'][contains(lower-case(.), 'includes')] and marc:subfield[@code='a'][ contains(lower-case(.), 'program note') or contains(lower-case(.), 'preface') or contains(lower-case(.), 'commentar') or contains(lower-case(.), 'manual') or contains(lower-case(.), 'codebook') or contains(lower-case(.), 'user instructions') or contains(lower-case(.), 'printed script') or contains(lower-case(.), 'sound') or contains(lower-case(.), 'thematic index') or contains(lower-case(.), 'libretto') or contains(lower-case(.), 'biography') or contains(lower-case(.), 'technical information') or contains(lower-case(.), 'historical information') or contains(lower-case(.), 'ethnological information') or contains(lower-case(.), 'instructional material') or contains(lower-case(.), 'music') ] ] )

pattern.name: 500$a Accompanied by AAM
pattern.xpath: exists( marc:datafield[@tag='500'][ not(marc:subfield[@code='5']) and marc:subfield[@code='a'][contains(lower-case(.), 'accompanied by')] and marc:subfield[@code='a'][ contains(lower-case(.), 'program note') or contains(lower-case(.), 'preface') or contains(lower-case(.), 'commentar') or contains(lower-case(.), 'manual') or contains(lower-case(.), 'codebook') or contains(lower-case(.), 'user instructions') or contains(lower-case(.), 'printed script') or contains(lower-case(.), 'sound') or contains(lower-case(.), 'thematic index') or contains(lower-case(.), 'libretto') or contains(lower-case(.), 'biography') or contains(lower-case(.), 'technical information') or contains(lower-case(.), 'historical information') or contains(lower-case(.), 'ethnological information') or contains(lower-case(.), 'instructional material') or contains(lower-case(.), 'music') ] ] ) and (exists(marc:datafield[@tag='700']/ marc:subfield[@code='e' or @code='4' or @code='0' or @code='1' or @code='t']) or exists(marc:datafield[@tag='710']/ marc:subfield[@code='e' or @code='4' or @code='0' or @code='1' or @code='t']) or exists(marc:datafield[@tag='711']/ marc:subfield[@code='e' or @code='4' or @code='0' or @code='1' or @code='t']) or exists(marc:datafield[@tag='730']))

pattern.name: 500$a Accompanied by
pattern.xpath: exists( marc:datafield[@tag='500'][ not(marc:subfield[@code='5']) and marc:subfield[@code='a'][contains(lower-case(.), 'accompanied by')] and marc:subfield[@code='a'][ contains(lower-case(.), 'program note') or contains(lower-case(.), 'preface') or contains(lower-case(.), 'commentar') or contains(lower-case(.), 'manual') or contains(lower-case(.), 'codebook') or contains(lower-case(.), 'user instructions') or contains(lower-case(.), 'printed script') or contains(lower-case(.), 'sound') or contains(lower-case(.), 'thematic index') or contains(lower-case(.), 'libretto') or contains(lower-case(.), 'biography') or contains(lower-case(.), 'technical information') or contains(lower-case(.), 'historical information') or contains(lower-case(.), 'ethnological information') or contains(lower-case(.), 'instructional material') or contains(lower-case(.), 'music') ] ] )

pattern.name: 500$a With AAM
pattern.xpath: (exists( marc:datafield[@tag='500'][ not(marc:subfield[@code='5']) and marc:subfield[@code='a'][contains(lower-case(.), 'with')] and marc:subfield[@code='a'][ contains(lower-case(.), 'program note') or contains(lower-case(.), 'preface') or contains(lower-case(.), 'commentar') or contains(lower-case(.), 'manual') or contains(lower-case(.), 'codebook') or contains(lower-case(.), 'user instructions') or contains(lower-case(.), 'printed script') or contains(lower-case(.), 'sound') or contains(lower-case(.), 'thematic index') or contains(lower-case(.), 'libretto') or contains(lower-case(.), 'biography') or contains(lower-case(.), 'technical information') or contains(lower-case(.), 'historical information') or contains(lower-case(.), 'ethnological information') or contains(lower-case(.), 'instructional material') or contains(lower-case(.), 'music') ] ] )) and (exists(marc:datafield[@tag='700']/ marc:subfield[@code='e' or @code='4' or @code='0' or @code='1' or @code='t']) or exists(marc:datafield[@tag='710']/ marc:subfield[@code='e' or @code='4' or @code='0' or @code='1' or @code='t']) or exists(marc:datafield[@tag='711']/ marc:subfield[@code='e' or @code='4' or @code='0' or @code='1' or @code='t']) or exists(marc:datafield[@tag='730']))

pattern.name: 500$a With
pattern.xpath: exists( marc:datafield[@tag='500'][ not(marc:subfield[@code='5']) and marc:subfield[@code='a'][contains(lower-case(.), 'with')] and marc:subfield[@code='a'][ contains(lower-case(.), 'program note') or contains(lower-case(.), 'preface') or contains(lower-case(.), 'commentar') or contains(lower-case(.), 'manual') or contains(lower-case(.), 'codebook') or contains(lower-case(.), 'user instructions') or contains(lower-case(.), 'printed script') or contains(lower-case(.), 'sound') or contains(lower-case(.), 'thematic index') or contains(lower-case(.), 'libretto') or contains(lower-case(.), 'biography') or contains(lower-case(.), 'technical information') or contains(lower-case(.), 'historical information') or contains(lower-case(.), 'ethnological information') or contains(lower-case(.), 'instructional material') or contains(lower-case(.), 'music') ] ] )

pattern.name: 300$b Supplementary content AAM
pattern.xpath: (some $item in $List300bSuppCont satisfies marc:datafield[@tag='300']/marc:subfield[@code='b'][contains(lower-case(.), $item)]) and (exists(marc:datafield[@tag='700']/ marc:subfield[@code='e' or @code='4' or @code='0' or @code='1' or @code='t']) or exists(marc:datafield[@tag='710']/ marc:subfield[@code='e' or @code='4' or @code='0' or @code='1' or @code='t']) or exists(marc:datafield[@tag='711']/ marc:subfield[@code='e' or @code='4' or @code='0' or @code='1' or @code='t']) or exists(marc:datafield[@tag='730']))

pattern.name: 300$b Supplementary content
pattern.xpath: some $item in $List300bSuppCont satisfies marc:datafield[@tag='300']/marc:subfield[@code='b'][contains(lower-case(.), $item)]

pattern.name: 300$a Supplementary content AAM
pattern.xpath: (some $item in $List300aSuppCont satisfies marc:datafield[@tag='300']/marc:subfield[@code='a'][contains(lower-case(.), $item)]) and (exists(marc:datafield[@tag='700']/ marc:subfield[@code='e' or @code='4' or @code='0' or @code='1' or @code='t']) or exists(marc:datafield[@tag='710']/ marc:subfield[@code='e' or @code='4' or @code='0' or @code='1' or @code='t']) or exists(marc:datafield[@tag='711']/ marc:subfield[@code='e' or @code='4' or @code='0' or @code='1' or @code='t']) or exists(marc:datafield[@tag='730']))

pattern.name: 300$a Supplementary content
pattern.xpath: some $item in $List300aSuppCont satisfies marc:datafield[@tag='300']/marc:subfield[@code='a'][contains(lower-case(.), $item)]

pattern.name: 245$c Introduction, etc. AAM
pattern.xpath: (some $item in $List245cIntroductionTerms satisfies marc:datafield[@tag='245']/marc:subfield[@code='c'][contains(lower-case(.), $item)]) and (exists(marc:datafield[@tag='700']/ marc:subfield[@code='e' or @code='4' or @code='0' or @code='1' or @code='t']) or exists(marc:datafield[@tag='710']/ marc:subfield[@code='e' or @code='4' or @code='0' or @code='1' or @code='t']) or exists(marc:datafield[@tag='711']/ marc:subfield[@code='e' or @code='4' or @code='0' or @code='1' or @code='t']) or exists(marc:datafield[@tag='730']))

pattern.name: 245$c Introduction, etc.
pattern.xpath: some $item in $List245cIntroductionTerms satisfies marc:datafield[@tag='245']/marc:subfield[@code='c'][contains(lower-case(.), $item)]

pattern.name: 65X$a Sound books, etc. AAM
pattern.xpath: (exists( marc:datafield[(@tag, '655')]/marc:subfield[@code='a'][ contains(., 'Sound effects books') or contains(., 'Sound books') or contains(., 'Musical books') ] ) or exists( marc:datafield[(@tag, '650')]/marc:subfield[@code='a'][ contains(., 'Sound effects books') or contains(., 'Sound books') or contains(., 'Musical books') ] )) and (exists(marc:datafield[@tag='700']/ marc:subfield[@code='e' or @code='4' or @code='0' or @code='1' or @code='t']) or exists(marc:datafield[@tag='710']/ marc:subfield[@code='e' or @code='4' or @code='0' or @code='1' or @code='t']) or exists(marc:datafield[@tag='711']/ marc:subfield[@code='e' or @code='4' or @code='0' or @code='1' or @code='t']) or exists(marc:datafield[@tag='730']))

pattern.name: 65X$a Sound books, etc.
pattern.xpath: exists( marc:datafield[(@tag, '655')]/marc:subfield[@code='a'][ contains(., 'Sound effects books') or contains(., 'Sound books') or contains(., 'Musical books') ] ) or exists( marc:datafield[(@tag, '650')]/marc:subfield[@code='a'][ contains(., 'Sound effects books') or contains(., 'Sound books') or contains(., 'Musical books') ] )

pattern.name: 65X$a Monologues with music, etc. AAM
pattern.xpath: exists( marc:datafield[starts-with(@tag, '65')]/marc:subfield[@code='a'][ contains(., 'Monologues with music') or contains(., 'Monologues (Music)') or contains(., 'Video recordings for the hearing impaired') ] ) and (exists(marc:datafield[@tag='700']/ marc:subfield[@code='e' or @code='4' or @code='0' or @code='1' or @code='t']) or exists(marc:datafield[@tag='710']/ marc:subfield[@code='e' or @code='4' or @code='0' or @code='1' or @code='t']) or exists(marc:datafield[@tag='711']/ marc:subfield[@code='e' or @code='4' or @code='0' or @code='1' or @code='t']) or exists(marc:datafield[@tag='730']))

pattern.name: 65X$a Monologues with music, etc.
pattern.xpath: exists( marc:datafield[starts-with(@tag, '65')]/marc:subfield[@code='a'][ contains(., 'Monologues with music') or contains(., 'Monologues (Music)') or contains(., 'Video recordings for the hearing impaired') ] )

pattern.name: 041 Accompanying, etc. AAM
pattern.xpath: exists( marc:datafield[@tag='041'][ marc:subfield[ @code='b' or @code='e' or @code='g' or @code='t' ] ] ) and (exists(marc:datafield[@tag='700']/ marc:subfield[@code='e' or @code='4' or @code='0' or @code='1' or @code='t']) or exists(marc:datafield[@tag='710']/ marc:subfield[@code='e' or @code='4' or @code='0' or @code='1' or @code='t']) or exists(marc:datafield[@tag='711']/ marc:subfield[@code='e' or @code='4' or @code='0' or @code='1' or @code='t']) or exists(marc:datafield[@tag='730']))

pattern.name: 041 Accompanying, etc.
008 MU Accompanying material AAM
pattern.xpath: (( substring(marc:leader, 7, 1) = 'c' or substring(marc:leader, 7, 1) = 'd' or substring(marc:leader, 7, 1) = 'i' or substring(marc:leader, 7, 1) = 'j' ) and ( matches(substring(marc:controlfield[@tag='008'], 25, 1), '^[a-z]$') )) and (exists(marc:datafield[@tag='700']/ marc:subfield[@code='e' or @code='4' or @code='0' or @code='1' or @code='t']) or exists(marc:datafield[@tag='710']/ marc:subfield[@code='e' or @code='4' or @code='0' or @code='1' or @code='t']) or exists(marc:datafield[@tag='711']/ marc:subfield[@code='e' or @code='4' or @code='0' or @code='1' or @code='t']) or exists(marc:datafield[@tag='730']))

pattern.name: 008 MU Accompanying material
pattern.xpath: ( substring(marc:leader, 7, 1) = 'c' or substring(marc:leader, 7, 1) = 'd' or substring(marc:leader, 7, 1) = 'i' or substring(marc:leader, 7, 1) = 'j' ) and ( matches(substring(marc:controlfield[@tag='008'], 25, 1), '^[a-z]$') )
